features: 10-in-1 Ways to Play - Total 167 pieces toy building sets can be built into 10 different models, including Tower crane, crane, forklift, catch car, rocket car, plane, racing car, UTV car, robot, helicopter. Including a step-by-step guide booklet for kids easy reference to build a variety of patterns.(Notice: one model at a time.) Best robotic toys & birthday present for 5 6 7+ year old boys.

Educational STEM Toys - Our kids learning toys is a perfect hand-on stem toys for 5+ year old. It can foster your kids’ imagination and creativity by building up different kinds of structure and enhance your kids' Science, Technology, Engineering, and Math skills. Great erector sets STEM activities for kids boys ages 5-7 8-12, educational building games for kids ages 4-8, boys toys age 6-8 8-10 years old.

Creative Interactive Toys - The building blocks encourage kids and families to work together as a team. Spend time with your kids and teach them how to assemble parts, how to read instructions, how to work together, and build different things! Perfect toys for 5+ year old boys, autism sensory toys for kids 5-7 8-12, kids toys for boys age 4-5.

Safety & Easy to Storage - The kids building kit construction engineering toys are easy to wash and come with a sturdy storage box for quick and convenient cleanups. All building blocks for kids ages 4-8 are bright, colorful, non-toxic that safe for kids to play! Great stem kits bins for kids age 6-8, steam toys ages 4-7.

Wonderful Gift - The stem kit is perfect STEM toys to get kids interested in STEM subjects early. Great creative kids games, indoor recess games for classroom, erector set building toys for kids ages 4-8 6-8 8-10, stem projects science kit for kids ages 8-12, stem toys for 5 6 7+ years old boys and girls. Christmas Birthday gifts for 4 5 6 7 8 9 year old boys. Hours and hours of FUN!!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: TSOMTTO Creative STEM Building Toys Kit - 167 pieces in a durable storage box Equipped with multiple tools for children to build together.Learning in entertainment and develop the ability to work with other kids.The STEM building set can be built into all sorts of fun models or toys.Tower crane, crane, forklift, catch car, rocket car, plane, racing car, UTV car, robot, helicopter. (Notice: one model at a time.)

✔What kids can learn from the STEM building blocks? Your kid can build 10 models according to the manual or use the imagination to build models, it cultivate kid's hands-on ability and innovation consciousness.(Notice: One Model At a Time.)When reading the manual and building the shape, kid have to think about how to build the model, it develop their logical thinking skills.The STEM building toys have 167 Pieces, providing enough pieces for kids to build with their parents or friends, it can improve their social skills.The STEM building toys for boys and girls offer colorful pieces that help kids to quickly find the parts and boost their hand-eye coordination.
Dinosaur Alphabet Matching Game Dancing Octopus 12 PCS Building Blocks 5 IN 1 Building Toys Dinosaur STEM Toys Toys ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Enjoyed by 6 year old
reviews.reviewText: My 6 year old grandson loves to build and design things and this purchase hit the mark. It allows him to bring use his imagination as well as practical skills and make things he can actually play with. It was a a good purchase and is a favorite activity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My son loves it
reviews.reviewText: The pieces are quite sturdy, and my son absolutely loves building different shapes, although he does not use the booklet of suggested builds

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my 4 year old. He loves seeing the completed builds even though mom does most of the work . Directions are a little bit hard to follow, had to rebuild a couple times due to misreading. Highly recommend for kids who like to tinker and build.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 5 Year Old Loved it!
reviews.reviewText: My son loves this so much! We had to help him on the first few builds, but once he got the hang of it he didn’t put it down. Super great gift and toy for kids so they use their brains and hands with no TV or tablet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great gift for my grandson
reviews.reviewText: This is a great gift for my grandson who is energetic and always questioning things and likes to experiment. It is a good learning tool and it will help him to learn to build new things.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was a nice kit with a lot of pieces. Given as a birthday gift. When the child opened it he said “I love it” but I don’t know if he played with it.
Es un juguete increíble que enamoro y cautivo a mi hijo de y años.Lo volvería a comprar ya que es resistente , calidad y muy seguro para su creatividad y autonomía.
